SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.issuer

Interface CAService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCAService
public interface CAService
Interface for a CA service.

The CA service provides the collective core services of a CA including certificate issuance and revocation.

This interface is not necessary to provide a CA service, but it can be a convenient collection point that consolidates all the parts of the CA service and its core functions.

Author:
Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

  • Method Details

    • getCertificateModelBuilder

      CertificateModelBuilder getCertificateModelBuilder(CertNameModel<?> subject, PublicKey publicKey) throws CertificateIssuanceException
      Get a base model builder for a certificate to be issued. This model builder is populated with default properties for certificates issued by this CA.
      Parameters:
      subject - subject name
      publicKey - public key to be certified in the certificate
      Returns:
      CertificateModel
      Throws:
      CertificateIssuanceException - errors creating certificate model Get the CRL issuer instance for this CA service

    • issueCertificate

      org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder issueCertificate(CertificateModel certificateModel) throws CertificateIssuanceException
      Issue and register a new certificate based on a certificate model
      Parameters:
      certificateModel - certificate model
      Returns:
      issued certificate
      Throws:
      CertificateIssuanceException - errors issuing the certificate

    • revokeCertificate

      void revokeCertificate(BigInteger serialNumber, Date revocationDate) throws CertificateRevocationException
      Revoke a certificate issued by the CA service with unspecified reason
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - serial number of the issued certificate
      revocationDate - revocation time
      Throws:
      CertificateRevocationException - errors revoking the certificate

    • revokeCertificate

      void revokeCertificate(BigInteger serialNumber, int reason, Date revocationDate) throws CertificateRevocationException
      Revoke a certificate issued by the CA service. The revocation request MUST be rejected if the specified serial number does not exist or if the certificate with this serial number has already been revoked with a reason other than certificate hold
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - serial number of the issued certificate
      reason - reason code
      revocationDate - revocation time
      Throws:
      CertificateRevocationException - errors revoking the certificate

    • publishNewCrl

      org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CRLHolder publishNewCrl() throws IOException
      Publish a new CRL from the CA service
      Returns:
      the newly published CRL or null if no CRL was issued.
      Throws:
      CertificateRevocationException - errors revoking the certificate
      IOException
